Package model

The model package contains all the game logic for Snap.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Card
    Contains functionality for a playing card.
    Deck
    Contains functionality for a deck of Card Objects.
    Game
    Game handles game play, and contains the players and the communal pile of cards.
    Player
    Contains functionality for player.
    ScoreCard
    ScoreCard keeps track of results of previous games.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    CardException
    Exceptions related to misuse of Card Objects.
    GameException
    Exceptions from game play.

Package model Description

The model package contains all the game logic for Snap. This includes the Card class, the Deck class, the Player class, the ScoreCard class, and the Game class.
